0.Name: Aristocrat
0.Flavor: You are a patrician, and believe yourself to be one of a finer class of people.

1.Name: Heretic
1.Flavor: Your family belonged to a forbidden religion, which exposed you to the constant threat of persecution.
1.Feature Description: You have proficiency with orbs, staffs and wands.

2.Name: Mountainfolk
2.Flavor: You come from an isolated town in the mountains.
2.Feature Description: When you are staggered, gain temporary HP equal to your level.

3.Name: Seafarer
3.Flavor: You grew up on boats or ships.

4.Name: Traveler
4.Flavor: Your family moved about a lot, whether out of wanderlust or necessity.

5.Name: Urchin
5.Flavor: You grew up on the streets, without parents – or without parents worth speaking of.
5.Feature Description: You have proficiency with martial weapons in the light blade weapon group.
